EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Debug and Maintain your Spring Boot App.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Debug and Maintain your Spring Boot App
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Debug and Maintain your Spring Boot App with Greg Turnquist. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, May 28, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Europe: 3:00pm GMT Summer Time (London, GMT+01:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=eb3b63ae3e7258296fa051f0ea8e805fa> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 666 320 107 Thank you,
